en.purpose: To record additional composition metadata aligned with IHE-XDS which is not already available from the Reference Model COMPOSITION class.
en.use: Use to add IHE-XDS aligned metadata to a COMPOSITION.context, which along with existing COMPOSITION attributes, allows the composition to be registered in an IHE-XDS environment.

de.purpose: Zur Aufzeichnung vorausschauender Entscheidungen Ã¼ber die Gesamtabsicht der Pflege und mÃ¶gliche Interventionen, die in der Regel von einem Kliniker durchgefÃ¼hrt werden.
de.use:
Dient zur Aufzeichnung von vorausschauenden Entscheidungen Ã¼ber die Gesamtabsicht der Pflege und mÃ¶gliche Interventionen fÃ¼r eine Person. Die Entscheidungen unterstÃ¼tzen Kliniker, indem sie Hinweise auf mÃ¶gliche Behandlungen, AktivitÃ¤ten und diagnostische oder therapeutische Verfahren geben, die lebensrettend oder lebensverlÃ¤ngernd sein kÃ¶nnen oder unerwÃ¼nschte Nebenwirkungen verursachen. 

Dieser Archetyp soll als Teil einer integrierten Pflege- oder Lebensendplanung verwendet werden und nicht als Reaktion auf eine akute oder Notfallsituation. Jede Entscheidung sollte als Reaktion auf den allgemeinen Gesundheitszustand und die allgemeinen UmstÃ¤nde der Person getroffen werden und wird in der Regel von einem Arzt nach BerÃ¼cksichtigung der PatientenverfÃ¼gung oder der erklÃ¤rten PrÃ¤ferenzen der Person durchgesetzt.

Es kann unter bestimmten UmstÃ¤nden notwendig sein vorÃ¼bergehende Ãberschreitungen der Ã¼blichen VorausverfÃ¼gungen zu erfassen, z. B. wÃ¤hrend einer Schwangerschaft oder prÃ¤operativ. In dieser Situation wird es notwendig sein eine separate Instanz dieses Archetyps aufzuzeichnen, unter Verwendung einer Kombination aus relevanten GÃ¼ltigkeits- und ÃberprÃ¼fungsdaten.
de.misuse:
Nicht zur Aufzeichnung einer "PatientenverfÃ¼gung" oder der PrÃ¤ferenzen der Person fÃ¼r die Pflege verwenden - verwenden Sie zu diesem Zweck EVALUATION.advance_care_directive.

Nicht zu verwenden fÃ¼r die Aufzeichnung von Anordnungen, die als Folge der getroffenen und mit diesem Archetyp aufgezeichneten Entscheidungen erforderlich sind. Verwenden Sie fÃ¼r diesen Zweck spezifische Archetypen INSTRUCTION oder ACTION.

nb.purpose: For Ã¥ registrere en forhÃ¥ndsbeslutning om den overordnede intensjonen med omsorg/behandling, samt hensiktsmessig behandling eller intervensjoner for et individ. Disse bestemmelsene er vanligvis tatt av en eller flere klinikere.
keywords: HLR-minus, R minus, resucitering, DNR, Do not resucitate, EoL, end of life, direktiv, behandlingsmÃ¥l, intervensjon, beslutning, livsforlengende, palliativ, gjenoppliving, forhÃ¥ndssamtale, forberedende samtale
nb.use:
For Ã¥ registrere en forhÃ¥ndsbeslutning om den overordnede intensjonen med omsorg/behandling, samt hensiktsmessige intervensjoner (inkludert behandling og tiltak) for et individ. Beslutningene vil stÃ¸tte klinikere ved Ã¥ fungere som retningslinjer knyttet til mulige behandlinger, tiltak og diagnostiske eller terapeutiske prosedyrer som kan vÃ¦re livreddende, livsforlengende eller fÃ¸re til uÃ¸nskede konsekvenser for individet.

Denne arketypen er tenkt brukt som en del av behandlingsplan eller plan for omsorg i livets sluttfase, og ikke gjort under tidspress i en akutt- eller nÃ¸dsituasjon. De enkelte beslutningene bÃ¸r vÃ¦re tilpasset individets overordnede helse og situasjon. Beslutningene blir vanligvis tatt av en eller flere klinikere, etter ogsÃ¥ Ã¥ ha tatt hensyn til individets og/eller pÃ¥rÃ¸rendes Ã¸nsker i form av livstestamente eller andre oppgitte preferanser.

Det kan vÃ¦re nÃ¸dvendig Ã¥ gjÃ¸re midlertidige avvik fra beslutningene i spesielle tilfeller, for eksempel ved svangerskap eller i forbindelse med en operasjon. Da vil det vÃ¦re nÃ¸dvendig Ã¥ lage separate instanser av denne arketypen, og sette de relevante gyldighetsdatoene i Protokoll-delen.
nb.misuse:
Skal ikke brukes for Ã¥ registrere individets livstestament eller andre personlige Ã¸nsker, bruk i stedet arketypen "Fremtidig behandlingsvalg" (EVALUATION.advance_care_directive).

Skal ikke brukes for Ã¥ forordne eller gjÃ¸re endringer i igangsatte tiltak, basert pÃ¥ bestemmelser gjort i denne arketypen. Bruk spesifikke INSTRUCTION- eller ACTION-arketyper til dette.

en.purpose: To record anticipatory decisions about the overall intent of care and possible interventions, usually asserted by a clinician.
en.use:
Use to record anticipatory decisions about the overall intent of care and possible interventions for an individual. The decisions will support clinicians by providing guidance regarding possible treatments, activities, and diagnostic or therapeutic procedures that may be life-saving, life-prolonging or cause undesirable side effects. 

This archetype is intended to be used as part of integrated care or end-of-life planning, and not as a reaction to an acute or emergency situation. Each decision should be made in response to the individual's overall health and general circumstances, and usually asserted by a clinician after consideration of the individual's advance care directives or stated preferences.

It may be necessary to record temporary overrides to usual advance intervention decisions in specific circumstances, for example during pregnancy or preoperatively. In this situation it will be necessary to record a separate instance of this archetype, using a combination of relevant validity and review dates.
en.misuse:
Not to be used to record an 'Advance care directive' or the individual's preferences for care - use EVALUATION.advance_care_directive for this purpose.

Not to be used to record the orders required as a consequence of the decisions made and recorded using this archetype. Use specific INSTRUCTION or ACTION archetypes for this purpose.

at0008.1.description: Narrative description about all advance intervention decisions, including the CPR decision.

This includes any limitations, or conditional circumstances applicable, to interventions. This description may or may not be supported by structured data, recorded using the âPer interventionâ cluster. If both this narrative description and âPer interventionâ structured data is recorded, caution is required as there is a potential risk of divergence. This data element may be used to capture legacy data that is not available in a structured format.

en.purpose: To records details of the ability of an individual to use and understand information to make or consent to a decision, plan or intervention.
en.use:
Use to record details about the ability of an individual to use and understand information to make or consent to a decision, plan or intervention.

This archetype is intended to capture information about the mental capacity status of an individual, which is typically assessed in relation to a specific decision or plan that needs to be made about their medical care or treatment at a particular time. If specific details about the mental capacity assessments are required, additional archetypes can be nested within the 'Assessment details' SLOT.

at0000.1.description: The ability of an individual to use and understand information to make or consent to a decision, plan or intervention.

at0005.1.text: Does the person have sufficient capacity to participate in discussing the CPR recommendation?

en.purpose: To record information about legal directives or orders that apply to the individual.
keywords: legal, power, attorney, welfare, guardian, guardianship, representative, proxy, decision-maker, advocate, intervention, order
en.use:
Use to record information about legal directives or orders that apply to the individual, for example, a power of attorney, guardianship order, or mental health detention order.

This archetype has been specifically designed as a framework or structure that can be extended for the complex range of use cases and local requirements by nesting a variety of possible CLUSTER archetypes which will contain specific details as per national or other local requirements.

When used to record details of legally-binding documents, it MUST be ensured that the Legal directive archetype and any nested archetypes adhere to relevant legal requirements.
en.misuse:
Not to be used to record information about advance care directives. Use openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.advance_care_directive.v0 for this purpose.

Not to be used to record details of mental capacity assessments. Use openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.mental_capacity.v0 for this purpose.
